Noun: barbie  baa(r)-bee
Usage: Brit, informal
  1. An event or meal at which food is cooked outdoors over an open grill or fire
    - barbecue, barbeque, BBQ [Brit]

Derived forms: barbies

Type of: cookout [N. Amer]
